BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.BlockRam.cblockRam
BlackBox.comment:
cblockRam :: (Wrap a, KnownNat n, KnownNat m) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1],ARG[2])
          => SClock clk               -- clk,  ARG[3]
          -> Vec n a                  -- init, ARG[4]
          -> CSignal clk (Unsigned m) -- wr,   ARG[5]
          -> CSignal clk (Unsigned m) -- rd,   ARG[6]
          -> CSignal clk Bool         -- wren, ARG[7]
          -> CSignal clk a            -- din,  ARG[8]
          -> CSignal clk a
